quotes.message: There is way to turn negative thinking to positive thinking, it means seeing the positives and not focusing on the negatives.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Never say anything about yourself that you do not want to come true.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Focus on your potential instead of your limitations.
quotes.name: Alan Loy McGinnis

quotes.message: If you have a positive outlook in life, you will attract positive and passionate people.
quotes.name: Ed Austin

quotes.message: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Positive thinking is the key which unlocks the doors of the world.
quotes.name: Samuel McChord Crothers

quotes.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Positive thinking must be followed by positive doing.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle, or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.
quotes.name: Victoria Addino

quotes.message: Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: Positive thinking is the notion that if you think good thoughts, things will work out well. Optimism is the feeling of thinking things will be well and be hopeful.
quotes.name: Martin Seligman

quotes.message: Keep in mind that you need to stop comparing yourself with others. Don't seek validation by looking how well others are doing.
quotes.name: Scott Hinsborough

quotes.message: Keep your spirits up. Good things will come to you and you will come to good things.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible and achieves the impossible.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not remain so if you only perceive an ideal and strive to reach it. You cannot travel within and stand still without.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: When you think and say I can, confidence and happiness will fill your entire being.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: Don't hang with negative people. They will pull you down with them. Instead, invite them into your light and together you will both shine strong.
quotes.name: L.F. Young

quotes.message: Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: Don't be the slave of a negative character. Be the master of a positive character.
quotes.name: T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Positive thinking helps you stand back up again when you are knocked down by bad luck or negativity.
quotes.name: Tom Laurie

quotes.message: Think positively and masterfully, with confidence and faith, and life become more secure, more fraught with action, richer in experience and achievement.
quotes.name: Edward Rickenbacker

quotes.message: Positive thinking creates ingenuity and originality. Negative thinking cripples imagination and creativity.
quotes.name: T.P.Chia

quotes.message: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.name: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.name: Herm Albright

quotes.message: When you consistently maintain a positive frame of mind, you'll become known as a problem solver rather than a complainer. People avoid complainers. They seek out problem solvers.
quotes.name: Joseph Sommerville

quotes.message: We are responsible for what we are, and whatever we wish ourselves to be, we have the power to make ourselves.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Fill your mind with light, happiness, hope, feelings of security and strength, and soon your life will reflect these qualities.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: With everything that has happened to you, you can either feel sorry for yourself or treat what has happened as a gift. Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose.
quotes.name: Wayne W Dyer

quotes.message: Your positivity can become a castle around you which will protect you from the arrow of negativity.
quotes.name: Gurudev Shree Chitrabhanu

quotes.message: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: You must not allow yourself to dwell for a single moment on any kind of negative thought.
quotes.name: Emmet Fox

quotes.message: Positive thinking is powerful thinking. If you want happiness, fulfillment, success and inner peace, start thinking you have the power to achieve those things. Focus on the bright side of life and expect positive results.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: The power of positive thinking is like a car with a powerful engine that can take you to the summit of a mountain.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: What is the difference between an obstacle and an opportunity? Our attitude toward it.
quotes.name: J. Sidlow Baxter

quotes.message: Live as if your prayers are to be answered.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Positive anything is better than negative thinking.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Being in a positive state of mind is more important than you might think as the mind cannot be creative in a negative state. New ideas,thoughts and inspiration will only take place when the mind is positive.
quotes.name: Joe Hinchliffe

quotes.message: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: Positive thinking means expecting, believing, and visualizing what you want to achieve. It means seeing in your mind's eye the thing you want, as an accomplished fact.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: The difference between can and cannot are only three letters. Three letters that determine your life's direction.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson
